name: Crystal Hopper
description:
Use flinging based movement to collect all the crystals while avoiding hazards!  Explore several planets with unique challenges.  Each planet has varying gravity and a combination of obstacles to overcome.  Can you collect all the crystals?

Features:

  • 60 levels
  • 4 planets
  • 12 hazard types

Music by Benedict Roff-Marsh

Color palette used Endesga 64
